events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product has a large scratch on the back and some parts seem broken. I am very disappointed.
The issue has been classified under Product Defect due to customer mentioning broken parts and scratches on the received item.
An agent has been assigned to the case to assist the customer with the reported product defect and discuss next steps.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your product. I’m here to help get this sorted out for you as soon as possible.
Could you please send us photos that clearly show the scratch and any broken parts? This will help us assess the damage accurately.
I’ve attached photos showing both the scratch on the back and the broken piece near the side. Please let me know what can be done.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement item or a full refund for the defective product. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer the replacement, thank you. Please proceed with sending the new unit as soon as possible.
We have processed your replacement order and you will receive a confirmation email shortly. The new product should arrive within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your replacement product and to ask if everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it’s in perfect condition. Thank you for handling this so quickly!
We are happy to hear the replacement met your expectations. We are closing this case now. Feel free to reach out if you need anything else.
